#Text=Pinghu
#Text=Pinghu is a city in Zhejiang .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Pinghu , a city of 485,000 , is a historic city in northern Zhejiang .
#Text=Located a little over an hour 's drive from Shanghai , Suzhou and Hangzhou , Pinghu is well worth a stop for a day or two to visit attractions such as Mo 's Manor and East Lake .

#Text=Pinghu also serves as a pleasant alternative destination to spend your time during Chinese national holidays when better-known neighboring cities and attractions are engulfed in touristic chaos .

#Text=Pinghu District includes 7 towns and 3 districts , and is on the shore of the East China Sea on the Hangjiahu Plain in north-east Zhejiang Province , with Shanghai to its north and Hangzhou Bay to its south .
#Text=It has a north Asian tropical monsoon climate with four seasons and an annual average temperature of 16 degrees Celsius .

#Text=Pinghu is known for its horizontal plain , waterways and good weather , and has long been known as " A land of plenty fish and rice ; the homeland of watermelon lamps and a city of profound culture . "
#Text=Get in
#Text=Pinghu is accessible by long distance bus from Hangzhou and Shanghai .
#Text=A city bus travels between downtown Pinghu and Jiaxing .
#Text=Pinghu is not located on any train routes .
#Text=See
#Text=Mo 's Manor ( 莫氏庄园/Mòshì zhuāngyuán ) , 39 Renmin W Rd , Pinghu Shi , Jiaxing Shi , Zhejiang Sheng , China , 314200 .
#Text=Mo 's Manor is the former residence of one of Zhejiang Province 's wealthy merchant families .
#Text=Built in the 1890s at the end of the Qing Dynasty , the residence is composed of dozens of rooms , still furnished with antique furniture .
#Text=Three generations of the Mo family resided here until the premise was confiscated after the Communists came to power .
#Text=Behind the manor is a canal where you can stroll between arching bridges and hole-in-the-wall eateries . ¥
#Text=28 .
#Text=Pinghu Museum ( 平湖博物馆/Pínghú bówùguǎn ) ( 新华南路372号/No . 372 South Xinhua Road ) , ☏ +8657385136520 .
#Text=The museum collection is housed on the second floor of the museum .
#Text=While not large , the museum 's contents carry historical significance that far outweighs the size of the collection .

#Text=The main exhibition houses artifacts from the Zhuangqiao ( 庄桥 ) ruins located in Pinghu district and date from the Liangzhu Culture , which flourished in what is now northern Zhejiang province from 3400 to 2250 BCE .
#Text=Among the thousands of artifacts unearthed at Zhuangqiao are hundreds of examples of pottery , stone and bone that bear the etchings of proto-Chinese characters .
#Text=While the meaning of the images scratched out thousands of years is uncertain , many bear a striking resemblance to later characters .
#Text=The adjacent hall contains a fine collection of scroll paintings , mostly produced by regional artists , that date from the late Ming Dynasty to the mid-20th century .
#Text=Free .
#Text=Baoben Pagaoda ( 报本塔/Bàoběntǎ ) , Danhu Strreet ( 当湖街道/Dānghú Jiēdào ) .
#Text=First constructed during the Ming Dynasty , Baoben Pagoda is situated in a temple on the shore of East Lake .

#Text=The five story pagoda underwent renovations during the Qing Dynasty , and unlike a pair of historic pagodas in the historic downtown of Pinghu , survived the iconoclastic destruction of the reign of Mao Zedong .
#Text=The temple buildings surrounding the pagoda exude a incense fragrance from the stream of steady visitors who come to pray .
#Text=¥ 10 adults ; ¥ 5 elderly .
#Text=Do
#Text=East Lake ( 东湖/Dōnghú ) .
#Text=A stroll around East Lake , known to locals as Donghu , is a pleasant way of introducing yourself to the history and culture of Pinghu .

#Text=During national festivals , locals carve watermelons , the tasty symbol of Pinghu , into intricate carved lanterns , which if you are lucky you 'll find hanging from the roofs of the wooden-framed buildings surrounding the lake .
#Text=A large lotus-shaped building sits on the banks of the lake , while the Baoben Pagoda can been seen jutting out of the temple on the opposite side of the lake .

#Text=East Lake is a lively attraction during holidays , and you 'll see locals in their full regalia on display , but it wo n't be as absurdly packed as the Bund or West Lake in neighboring Hangzhou or Shanghai .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Pinghu has the biggest clothing output of any city in China .
#Text=There are a lot of factories that produce clothes and shoes for export .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Watermelon has been grown by Pinghu people since ancient times , and honored as the best watermelon in Southern China for over 800 years .
#Text=It 's delicious and famous for the advantages of Pinghu , such as high content of sugar , juiciness , fine pulp and thin rind .
#Text=The watermelon enjoys high fame both at home and abroad , and is exported to faraway places including Hong Kong , Macao , and Southeast Asia .
#Text=Zaodan , Pinghu egg , is a sort of special egg that is preserved preserved in wine .
#Text=These eggs are soft , crystal like , mellow , fragrant , nutritious , and tasty , having the function of improving appetite , digestion and blood circulation .

#Text=These preserved eggs first appeared over 250 years ago during the reign of Emperor Yongzheng of Qing Dynasty , and later were awarded a gold tablet by Emperor Qianlong for being a first-class local tribute to the imperial court .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Myself Intercontinental ( 美宿洲际酒店/měisù zhōujì jiǔdiàn ) , No. 2 West Renmin Street ( 人民西路2号/rénmínxīlù 2 hào ) , ☏ +86 573-85289061 .
#Text=Myself
#Text=Intercontinental is clean and reasonably affordable .
#Text=It is situated directly across the street from historic Mo 's Manor and it is only a ten-minute walk from East Lake .
#Text=¥ 180 for queen sized room .
